properties.entry: SELECT n.* FROM notification n, (SELECT MAX(sent_date) AS max_sent_date FROM notification WHERE orcid=:orcid AND notification_type = 'AMENDED') amend, (SELECT (send_change_notifications * 24 * 60 * 60) as freq FROM email_frequency WHERE orcid =:orcid) amend_freq, (SELECT MAX(sent_date) AS max_sent_date FROM notification WHERE orcid=:orcid AND notification_type in ('ADMINISTRATIVE', 'CUSTOM')) administrative, (SELECT (send_administrative_change_notifications * 24 * 60 * 60) as freq FROM email_frequency WHERE orcid =:orcid) administrative_freq, (SELECT MAX(sent_date) AS max_sent_date FROM notification WHERE orcid=:orcid AND notification_type in ('PERMISSION', 'INSTITUTIONAL_CONNECTION')) permission, (SELECT (send_member_update_requests * 24 * 60 * 60) as freq FROM email_frequency WHERE orcid =:orcid) permission_freq WHERE n.orcid = :orcid AND ( (n.notification_type='SERVICE_ANOUNCEMENT' AND sent_date IS NULL) OR (n.notification_type in ('ADMINISTRATIVE', 'CUSTOM') AND ( (n.sent_date IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(:effective_date) > (unix_timestamp(administrative.max_sent_date) + (administrative_freq.freq))) OR (administrative.max_sent_date IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(:effective_date) > (unix_timestamp(:record_active_date) + (administrative_freq.freq))) ) ) OR (n.notification_type='AMENDED' AND ( (n.sent_date IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(:effective_date) > (unix_timestamp(amend.max_sent_date) + (amend_freq.freq))) OR (amend.max_sent_date IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(:effective_date) > (unix_timestamp(:record_active_date) + (amend_freq.freq))) ) ) OR (n.notification_type IN ('PERMISSION', 'INSTITUTIONAL_CONNECTION') AND ( (n.sent_date IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(:effective_date) > (unix_timestamp(permission.max_sent_date) + (permission_freq.freq))) OR (permission.max_sent_date IS NULL AND unix_timestamp(:effective_date) > (unix_timestamp(:record_active_date) + (permission_freq.freq))) ) ) );
